data.text: i liked this place with my friends  , this beach club is so nice, the best in dubai, the party is also very nice, the pool and the food as well, and also it has access to the beach and the sea ,  i will come back for sure ! thank you ! i recommend this place
data.title: nice

data.text: I had amazing day with my friends at Nikki beach club ! The beach club is very big and nice , they have big pool and also amazing open sea , so beautiful beach . The food was amazing , I highly recommend sea bass ) was very good . Beautiful sunset amazing atmosphere . One of my favorite place in dubai
data.title: Amazing beach club

data.text: Such a beautiful beach club, convenient location, food was great and staff is friendly, enjoyed taking pics in the pool and beach. Me and my girls enjoyed the DJ and the atmosphere, I would totally recommend it. Special thanks to Alex for making our experience even better
data.title: Great

owner_response.author: Nikki Beach

data.text:
We met up with some old friends for brunch at Nikki Beach. Brandon greeted us and helped us select a great table. He looked after us throughout our meal and was an amazing host.  Even at the end, he helped us find sofas so we could enjoy the sunset overlooking the beach. 
The atmosphere was really relaxed and the pool and restaurant area were beautiful. 
The food was great - really varied options for the starters and the desserts and the fish and meat options for the main were beautifully cooked and presented. 
Champagne flowed throughout - totally recommend that package. Thanks Brandon and team, we’ll be back for sure.
data.title: Best brunch in dubai

data.text:
Amazing Service at the Brunch.  Great value for money and the best brunch we’ve been to Dubai. Brandon was amazing.. great experience from start to finish. Nothing was too much trouble for him. 

Food was beautiful.  Would definitely recommend.
data.title: Amazing Brunch Experience
